issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Base UI > Views > Dashboard View
3. Press the Toggle editable
4. Press on all the icons

Actual Result:
Application crash
Apr 26 15:16:30 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] <Warning>: (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0xce86]) Job appears to have crashed: Segmentation fault: 11
Apr 26 15:16:30 unknown SpringBoard[30] <Warning>: Application 'KitchenSink' exited abnormally with signal 11: Segmentation fault: 11
Apr 26 15:16:31 unknown ReportCrash[620] <Error>: Saved crashreport to /var/mobile/Library/Logs/CrashReporter/KitchenSink_2011-04-26-151630_openDoc.plist using uid: 0 gid: 0, synthetic_euid: 501 egid: 0

Expected Result:
Should not crash
fields.summary: iOS: Dashboard View: (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0xce86]) Job appears to have crashed: Segmentation fault: 11
fields.environment: iPhone 4.3.2 with INFO Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (04/26/11 11:54 6b80fd9...)

comments.body: Cannot reproduce with current build.  Please regress.
